CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . On DATE police officers from ORG arrested the applicant on suspicion of membership of an illegal armed organisation , the Dev - Yol ( NORP Way ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( sıkıyönetim mahkemesi ) ordered the applicant ’s detention on remand .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG filed a bill of indictment with ORG against the applicant and CARDINAL other defendants . ORG accused the applicant , inter alia , of membership of the Dev - Yol , whose object was to undermine the constitutional order and replace it with a NORP - Leninist regime . The prosecution sought the death penalty under LAW of LAW .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the applicant ’s release pending trial .

CARDINAL . In a judgment of DATE ORG convicted the applicant of membership of the LAW . It sentenced the applicant to CARDINAL years’ imprisonment under LAW of LAW , permanently debarred him from employment in the civil service and placed him under judicial guardianship .
CARDINAL . As the applicant ’s sentence exceeded CARDINAL years’ imprisonment , his case was automatically referred to ORG ( askeri yargıtay ) .

CARDINAL . Following promulgation of the PERSON of DATE , which abolished the jurisdiction of ORG , ORG ( yargıtay ) acquired jurisdiction over the case and on DATE the case file was transmitted to it .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed the applicant ’s conviction on the ground that he should have been convicted of the offence under LAW of LAW . It referred the case to ORG ( ağır ceza mahkemesi ) . The criminal proceedings are still pending before the latter court .
CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL of LAW provides :

“ Whosoever shall attempt to alter or amend in whole or in part LAW or to effect a coup ORG formed under LAW or to prevent it by force from carrying out its functions shall be liable to the death penalty . ”
CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL of the Criminal Code reads :

“ Any person who , with the intention of committing the offences defined in ORG ... , forms an armed gang or organisation or takes leadership ... or command of such a gang or organisation or assumes some special responsibility within it shall be sentenced to not less than DATE imprisonment .
The other members of the gang or organisation shall be sentenced to not CARDINAL and not more than fifteen years’ imprisonment . ”
